title: Between the Scenes - Guest Edition: John Legend's Daughter Is a Fan of His Work
itunes:title: Between the Scenes - Guest Edition: John Legend's Daughter Is a Fan of His Work
description:
John Legend answers questions from Trevor and the audience about his children's musical preferences and how streaming has changed the music industry.
